name: Enkindle (Cloudy Boxscape)
description:
We worked on a game for Ludum Dare 46 that is called Enkindle.

Keep your fire lit and protect your fuel against persistent pests in this strange and barren  wasteland.

Controllers:

WASD to move

E to interact on the blower, trees and fire.

Goal:

Keep the fire burning by chopping trees to gather wood.

To speed up the to burning process of the new wood you have added, use the blower to fan the flames and help the wood to start to blaze.

Scare away the unrelenting enemies and keep them from stealing your fuel.

Keep the fire lit for as long as you can

Or

be engulfed by the darkness.
